metadata.title: CVE-2021-47579 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ovl: fix warning in ovl_create_real()Syzbot triggered the following warning in ovl_workdir_create() ->ovl_create_real():	if (!err && WARN_ON(!newdentry->d_inode)) {The reason is that the cgroup2 filesystem returns from mkdir withoutinstantiating the new dentry.Weird filesystems such as this will be rejected by overlayfs at a laterstage during setup, but to prevent such a warning, call ovl_mkdir_real()directly from ovl_workdir_create() and reject this case early.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
